p: The final result was in ASCII format, which was mapped to the map of China after rasterization by Arcgis10.5 GIS software for further analysis. The grade of potential suitable zone was as follows: unsuitable habitat < 0.1; 0.1 ≤ poorly suitable habitat < 0.3; 0.3 ≤ moderately suitable habitat < 0.6; and highly suitable habitat ≥ 0.6.
